p: Total flavonoids content estimation was realized with the AlCl 3 method [ 22]. 1.5 mL of extracts was added to equal volumes of a solution of 2% AlCl 3.6H 2O. The mixture was thoroughly mixed and incubated for 10 min at room temperature; the absorbance was read at 367.5 nm. Data were expressed in mg quercetin equivalents per gram (mg QE/g) of dried extract.
